website_summaries.verdict: These boots are perfect for those with wider calves, but they may not last in rough conditions.
pros: The adjustable leather strap is a nice, chic detail
cons: Some complaints of ripping after just a couple of uses

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all - Large tear after a couple wears.
customer_reviews.text: Loved these boots for the first 5 times I wore them. Just grazed them past my shopping cart yesterday and now I have a huge tear on the side of my boots. VERY disappointed as these were supposed to be durable rain boots! Also cannot find a contact to inform the CHOOKA company about my disappointment in their product! At this point would not purchase them again :(
customer_reviews.author: Derek VanDooren

customer_reviews.title: If you buy these boots, add a roll of duct tape
customer_reviews.text: These Boots were delivered on 5/16/17. The picture I attached was the condition of them on 8/14/17. They were worn exactly 6 times as muck boots in horse stable/paddock areas. They are not functional. Don't waste your money, but if you decide to anyway add duct tape to your cart to patch the tears, you will need it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful boots
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer with wildlife and work with turtles quite a bit. This means that i am constantly changing water and getting water thrown all over my feet. These boots have done their job through it all! Not once have i gone home with wet feet! These boots are cute and functional. I would recommend these boots to anyone. I may have only had them for a little over 5 weeks, but they are holding up and show no signs of tears or excessive wear.
customer_reviews.author: Sam25

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these boots. They fit perfect even with or with out a pair of socks(thick and thin). I have pretty big calves so the height is great. Although I do wish I could find some that are a little higher that would fit my calves. The only reason I'm giving 4 and not 5 stars is the foot liner inside always comes out or bunchs up when putting on or taking off, one of them is actually starting to peel apart. I'm going to have to get some adhesive tape or something to prevent this from happening or get a new set of liners. Other than that....Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Mel G

customer_reviews.title: Good Rain Boots
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be well constructed and much better than some other rain boots in the same price range I've had in the past. The footbed seems to be glued down pretty well and the boots are as comfortable as rain boots can be. I've worn them a few times now and have walked thru puddles with no leaks. My only gripe is that they have a very strong rubber smell to them. I've only had them a couple of weeks and they're getting less smelly, so I'm hopeful the scent will wear off over time.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Cutie pie boots
customer_reviews.text: I have feet with neuropathy issues and get severe cramps...bought this boot for slip on ease and wide shank Wonderful !!! Sweet little boot....easily slip my sore feet into the boot for yardwork/washing garage floor/fishing/snow Especially good as snow boots... big/wide enuf for thicker socks, Wonderful soles, non-slip...I don't need furry boots for winter, I need non-slip and good support I have found over the years that nothing beats a good rain boot for arch support, heel support and no-fall-down support. Easy on, easy off :)
customer_reviews.author: Boatdoc

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: These were great for 1.5 months. Then the boot started breaking down. At first I noticed that my feet were getting a bit damp, then the next quite a bit more. Yesterday when I had to walk through puddles, the water saturated my feet through small brittle holes on the top of my boots! I received these 12/28/15 and yesterday, 03/12/16, they were thrown in the garbage after these boots completely broke down and soaked my feet. SO dissatisfied and disappointed. I believe rubber boots should last more than 3 months!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: First of all let me say these are super cute to be black rain boots
customer_reviews.text: First of all let me say these are super cute to be black rain boots, the brown buckle gives it a little something extra, and they don’t make my feet feel like clown feet lol I normally wear an 8 and that’s what I ordered, they are actually a little big. I’m sure they will fit with thick winter socks though! I only gave 4 stars because 1 boot does have a small tear in the rubber, but it’s not significant enough to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Bennett-Sluss

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: These were a major help during the rain in Louisiana this past week. They're relatively comfortable. A tad heavy. The only super annoying part was the lining on the bottom kept coming out when I would take them off. And it would also get bunched up. But the fit was great. Slightly on the bigger side which is good for big socks. And the width is a little adjustable which is nice. Totally able to tuck pants in too. Would buy again for sure
customer_reviews.author: MamaBearbear

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend not to wear thick socks with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in a size bigger (normally wear a women's US7/7.5, bought it in a US8) in order to ensure that it would fit my calf, since, I have big calves. They fit the calf, but the foot area is a little narrow. I would recommend not to wear thick socks with it. Also, since I love walking through the puddles I noticed that you could feel how cold the water was, but thankfully no water got in! So it's a great rainboot! Just wish, the foot area wasn't so narrow. I would buy these for a friend or family member.
customer_reviews.author: Beann

customer_reviews.title: Update: Already unusable
customer_reviews.text: Update: (11/26/18) about 2 weeks ago I drop something on the ground. When I squatted down to pick it up the boot split up the back and now they are useless. What a waste you of money for me. :( They fit great and are comfortable and cute. However, they lost the shine the almost immediately after putting them on. I've not worn them much, but they are already scuffed. No rain boots will stay perfect and I only need them for rain.
customer_reviews.author: Peej

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the short version but got the tall version
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this very boot and they shipped me the tall version with two buckles instead of the short version with one buckle. Had to send them back because my calves are too big.
customer_reviews.author: K. Houlihan

customer_reviews.title: Like them
customer_reviews.text: I had read some reviews and some had mentioned they were rather large. So I chose the 10, I was worried about getting them on and off. I tried with a sock and was about to return and tried with a bare foot and Walla! They are keepers for me. I haven't worn them for long periods of time as of yet. I have a wider width but these were fine once I slipped them on. I use a boot grip to get them off though. Something people often use for western boots. Not sure they have too much arch support but a tad.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Name of Color is Very Unhelpful
customer_reviews.text: The boots are fine. I had tried them on in a store so knew what to expect. I add cushioning insoles which takes up some of the extra space. What was really disappointing was clarity about the color. They are labeled "midnight," whatever that means. Unfortunately I went by a customer review that said the color "midnight" is black. They are definitely not black. They are navy blue. Definitely not what I was looking for. I would prefer color names that give you accurate information.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Pride

customer_reviews.title: Cracked. Within months.
customer_reviews.text: I've barely had time to wear these, and out on a rainy evening I noticed a crack where the ball of the foot bends the boot. My previous pair lasted more than 6 years, so I'm beyond disappointed that this pair couldn't make it 8 months. Chooka is the only brand of boots that fits my wide calves, but I'll think twice before ordering another pair.
customer_reviews.author: L. Block

customer_reviews.title: Great rain boots
customer_reviews.text: Great rain boots. Fit my wider calves. My only complaint is that the inner sole started rolling up in the back after just one wear. Superglued it down as I could not return it at that point and that solved the issue.
customer_reviews.author: I. Carino

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have larger calves
customer_reviews.text: Fit PERFECTLY. Great if you have larger calves. I had tried multiple other boots before finding these and I LOVE them. ** loved these boots but I have only had them since July and probably worn 6 times and they have a hole on the side and I am super dissapointed. I read reviews that this has happened to others and took a chance. wishing I didnt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SAVED MY LIFE at Electric Forest
customer_reviews.text: As the title says, these truly saved my festival experience this year. Super muddy grounds, these kept my feet clean and dry, showed no signs of wear and washed easily. The one thing i would say is that you have to wear high socks if wearing these with shorts because the side rubs against your calf so if you dont youll get a really uncomfortable blister. But theyre really cute boots.
customer_reviews.author: ZE

customer_reviews.title: chookA is my new favorite boot brand
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 10M which is usually my size ( left foot 10 1/2; right foot 10. Usually I'm a 10 in boots). Width was perfect but the boot was short. I exchanged for an 11M, and the boot fits perfectly. Sole and rubber material is sturdy and not too heavy or stiff. Walked all around town yesterday, 3 or more hours—my feet feel great! No soreness. The boots have a sporty style, and I will be wearing them all through the winter, rain or shine!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Reiner

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, fails quickly
customer_reviews.text: This week marks two months since I have had these boots. I used them to go to the dog park, and walk the dog when it's raining. I live in Portland, so it rains a lot, and I have worn them a couple times a week. This week I noticed that my feet were wet from water inside the shoe. The heels both have holes in them, causing leakage. I think it's definitely lame to have a product two months before it fails. Bad quality!
customer_reviews.author: Applefritter Party

customer_reviews.title: Short shelf life
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing for the price. Although it deteriorated quickly, I had these for 2 years and the soles came apart and started to let mud and water in. If you are looking for a good pair for a year or two then these are great! But if you want something more long term I would get a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: There's other better choices.
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter claims to like them but I was put of by the fact that on the first seriously rainy day she chose NOT to wear them to school because she "couldn't get her pants to fit in them." That baffles me since they're not form fitting boots. In addition, though she says she likes the style -- and over recent years even I have come to appreciate the various popular military boot styles ... I personally think this pair looks less edgy than just plain clunky. I'm concerned they're going to end up in the back of her closet.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Easy in and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Almost exactly what I hoped. The only reason it doesn't get a 5 star is that the top edge sometimes bends when I slip into it . It s my "walk the puppy in the middle of the night" boot, so it has to be fast to get into, lightweight and comfortable. It is all those things
customer_reviews.author: John Gillis

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my little sister who walks to work and was complaining about her feet being soaked all day if its wet out. She absolutely loves these! They fit exactly right and she said they are really comfortable to walk in (she walks about half an hour to work). We were a bit worried because she has really large calves but these are the perfect height to avoid issues. I did buy her inserts for them in case and she said she doesn't need them at all! She has had them for three months now and has used them a lot and still loves them and her feet are still dry.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Dibble

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Sized
customer_reviews.text: These boots are huge! I bought in my normal size; I felt like I'd step right out of these. I had to return and didn't purchase another pair because the sizing is so odd - I was worried about a replacement pair in a different size not fitting either. I like the style, and might consider if I could try on a pair in a store to find the right size without having to go through the hassle of return shipping. Then again, I shop online so that I won't have to bother going out to a store...
customer_reviews.author: esp60174

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!! SEE PICTURE I TOOK
customer_reviews.text: I bought these December 14, 2015 and RARELY wore them because it doesn't really rain in California. Well, we are having unusual rain these past few days so I have been wearing these boots and they tore! How disappointing. I don't have to walk a lot at my job so they didn't get heavy use either. Put them on, drove to work, sat at work, drove home and took them off. I would NOT recommend them at all! If I could return them I would.
customer_reviews.author: R. Salas

customer_reviews.title: Too small for high instep....what the heck is with the "Sharpie" repair stuff???
customer_reviews.text: Okay. The boots are cute, as muck boots go. And there it ends. I have a high instep. They don't fit. I forced them on but they were too darn tight. And then there is the issue of the "Obvious Sharpie Marker Repair." There were marks on the boots that looked like Sharpie marker marks. I think they were actually thin pieces of rubber, applied over defects. Multiple defects. They are going back. The return label has been generated, and back they go. I can do better at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: FrequentFlyerHI

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof until they aren't!
customer_reviews.text: Like these boots. I wear a 6 & the 6 fit perfectly. I put an UGG sole liner inside. Problem: water proof until boot splits. I use the boots daily for dog walking. On my 3rd pair. 1 st pair eventually split at the seam in the back. 2nd pair the rubber split across the top of my foot. I fully expect my 3rd pair to split at some point. Either the rubber breaks down from warehouse storage or the material(rubber) is defective. I wrote the manufacturer but never received a response of any kind. My 3rd pair will be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't garden without them
customer_reviews.text: These are my 2nd pr. I accidentally sliced a slit in my first pair while gardening, stepped on a stupid sharp hoe - however, they DID save my foot from harm! I usually wear an 8 but after experiencing my first pair in 8, I downsized to 7 and actually like them better. Not so loose, so I "think" this brand must run a bit large.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: I know, I know... these will ...
customer_reviews.text: I know, I know...these will split within 2 months of wear. But, I don't care. They are the only rain boots that look cute and still fit my 18" calves. And yes, they are hot. So wear these on a cold, rainy day!
customer_reviews.author: Beauty AddictTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Never thought I'd find a comfortable rain boot!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. I wore them for hours at a concert in the rain. My feet were dry and didn't hurt, which is unusual for me. I have tried on many pairs of different brand boots in stores, and none of them felt comfortable like these do! I was leary of ordering the blue, but they were so much cheaper than the other colors. As it turns out, I like the blue. It is darker blue--not to bright.
customer_reviews.author: NY Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Worn about 10 times and both boots leaking!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these at first. I've had them for FIVE months and have probably worn them 10 times and BOTH boots are leaking 😠 I keep these in the house, not out in the weather. They should give me a new pair!!!
customer_reviews.author: CowgirlC

customer_reviews.title: Super cute boot
customer_reviews.text: Super cute boot! I have a pretty wide calf so I wanted a shorter boot and these are a perfect height. They do run a bit big but I like that I can slip them on and off easily. I am normally a true size 9 in women's and while they're slightly big I wouldn't have gone down a size. I've only just got them so I cannot speak to durability, but here's hoping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and the shape is great. Inlike how they open a bit at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and the shape is great. Inlike how they open a bit at the top to easily fit my pant leg. I hope with proper care they will hold up well. However - order one size up! I am a consistent size 8. Sometimes even a 7 1/2. I can get them on but even without socks they are downright snug. Getting off usually pulls the footbed out with my foot and i have to stuff it back in. I will be returning for a 9.
customer_reviews.author: Mucho

customer_reviews.title: Wide Calf Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: These rain boots are a very roomy mid-calf fit. If you are between sizes I would go down a size as they are a little roomy. Also this style of boot is perfect for someone with wide athletic calves, as they are expandable and very loose in the leg area, perfect for tucking in pants legs. They may not be a good for someone with thin legs, too loose I would imagine. Very comfortable foot bed, perfect for all day wear with mid to heavy weight socks on.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shkor

customer_reviews.title: Received boots, each in different size
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive these boots!! So I was disappointed to find when I opened them that one boot was a size 10 and the other was a size 11. Because of this error, had to return. :(
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kristina

customer_reviews.title: An investment you will not regret!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are fantastic! I purchased a size 8 and they fit perfectly. I was able to wear them with thick socks and with thin ankle socks as well. I have pretty large calves so I was worried about the height and opening of the boot but it was fine. I was able to tuck my jeans into the boot as well. I'm thinking about buying another pair in a different color. I highly recommend Chooka boots!
customer_reviews.author: MelSan

customer_reviews.title: I utterly love them. They're more expensive than what I would ...
customer_reviews.text: My legs are usually too wide to fit into rain boots, so when I found these ankle ones, I was hoping this would be the right solution. And it really was. I utterly love them. They're more expensive than what I would normally spend on rain boots but you can see the price reflected in the quality. I would buy these again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Rok Hamze

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with large calves!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are perfect if you have larger calves. I can never wear regular boots, I always need the wide calf option. These are perfect for anyone else like that. I am a size 10 and the 10 fit perfectly. I bought boot warmer socks (the shorter ones) to put in them and they fit inside the boots great. Very pleased with this purchase and I am sure these will be very useful when all of our Northern IL snow melts and my kids begin softball and baseball seasons!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My boot has cracked and there is a hole in the side of my boot.
customer_reviews.text: I'm standing at the bus stop and I look down and my boot has ripped! I am so sad! I loved these and I was so excited to have a pair of rain boots.
customer_reviews.author: hayley

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way these boots looked so I bought a pair. Within a few months the rubber actually split open on them so I had to throw them away. I decided to buy another pair because they were my favorite pair of rain boots. I paid $65 once again for a second pair.... I wore them maybe 4 times and the rubber once again cracked and split open!!!!! Waste of my money. I should have tried to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect even for those with thick calves
customer_reviews.text: I have wide calves and these fit perfect! I take the dog out in the backyard that is a pond almost three seasons of the year and these are perfect for it. They are easy to slip on and off and keep me dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Bad finish.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are supposed to have a shiny finish but there was a weird film covering the entire boot. There were parts that looked like a toddler applied the top coat. I tried to clean but with warm water and soap it wouldn't come off. Back they go. Maybe poor quality control?
customer_reviews.author: L. Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could've gotten a 6 1/2 then they would fit perfect. I also bought some Corkys Fleece Liner/Sticking for Rainboots and they'll need a little height folding but they make the boots fit like a charm, plus added warmth! They hit right under the bulge of my soccer calves, which is the perfect height my short legs!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: just what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: i'm glad to have found rainboots that are tall enough for deep puddles but short enough to fit my muscular calves. they are comfortable to walk in (though i haven't walked long distances) and are bright and cheery. On a gray day they are kind of flourescent actually but I don't mind. I did order a size down from my usual after trying a different pair of boots from this brand and they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: erkkilakc

customer_reviews.title: Careful on color choice
customer_reviews.text: The color I received was much lighter than the picture, but for the price I decided to keep them. I ordered the charcoal and they seemed like a much darker grey online. They fit as expected. Nice looking short rain boot. Perfect for thicker calves.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 7 & wear a 7 1/2 and these even allowed for a arch support insert. They are exactly as pictured & hit just right at the bottom of my calf. Great boot! UPDATE: 11/21/2015 - Both heels have cracked where the shaft meets the heel. I believe I've gotten my moneys worth when you divide $28 by 15 months. They aren't offered for the same price now. I wouldn't buy them again otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: supersweet67

customer_reviews.title: These are quality made, they just fit VERY large ...
customer_reviews.text: These are quality made, they just fit VERY large! I sent them back and bought a different brand at a store...and needed 2 sizes smaller than what I would usually wear in boots. I would have needed to go down 2 sizes in these as well.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Ledgerwood

customer_reviews.title: SECOND PAIR WITH THE EXACT SAME PROBLEM
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn these boots a handful of times. This is the second pair I have purchased and they BOTH cracked on the side.....VERY disappointed....I will b e contacting the company to ask for a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I'm glad I purchased them
customer_reviews.text: After some of the reviews, I was skeptical, but I'm glad I purchased them. I love them, looks just like the photo (I purchased mint). I typically wear a 7.5 but these fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The weather has been really rainy and these are perfect for the season planning on getting another pair my daughter took mine
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Sandora

customer_reviews.title: Faulty design
customer_reviews.text: I really loved these boots when I first got them but I wore them out in the snow today, a month after purchasing and I've maybe wore them five times, the sole of the boot is separating from the rest of the shoe. I am very disappointed and want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: A. Yuckenberg

customer_reviews.title: These boots cracked and let water in within 2 months ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots cracked and let water in within 2 months of use. Other Chooka boots I’ve had did not do this. The pair I bought was drastically cheaper, I thought due to the color. But maybe they were old? At any rate not inclined to buy another pair of Chookas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, too roomy for me
customer_reviews.text: The boots are beautiful and would be perfect for rainy, messy weather. Cute with jeans! However, they were too roomy for my average foot. I ordered a 6, which is my normal size -I think even with a very thick sock I would need a half size smaller. I would still recommend the Chooka based on it's great styling and solid appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: 1 1/2 years after I bought these boots they cracked ...
customer_reviews.text: 1 1/2 years after I bought these boots they cracked on the side so they can no longer do there job as rainbows. I don't wear them that often so kind of bummed they already are cracked.
customer_reviews.author: BizzBooBoo

customer_reviews.title: Does its job in the rain and is okay-ish on ...
customer_reviews.text: Does its job in the rain and is okay-ish on the cute scale. As for other reviews on tearing, I've had no issue. I am normally between a 7 and an 8 in shoes depending on the brand, I ordered these in a 8 and they fit just right with a tiny bit of wiggle room. I ordered charcoal, but received them in the dark grey color. I'm not a picky person, so for me it wasn't a big deal, BUT it's not what I bought.
customer_reviews.author: College Student

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Don't order these if you hate constant compliments or answering the question "WHERE DID YOU GET YOUR CUTE BOOTS?" Awesome color options too.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Starting peeling
customer_reviews.text: My mom has been wearing this shoe for a while and she said the shoe is already starting to tear off from the bottom part. She liked the color and aesthetic but the shoe isn't durable to withstand normal wear.
customer_reviews.author: pet_kharab

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality; will fall apart quickly.
customer_reviews.text: These boots fell apart in less than a year of use. Do not buy. They developed a large crack in one boot within one rainy season of use, not even regular use. Very subpar quality. A waste of money. They looked cute for the 5 months I was able to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2Wifeof1

customer_reviews.title: Slip off heal
customer_reviews.text: So cute. Unfortunately they slipped on my heal. Smaller sizes was obviously too small. I don't understand why people always recommend sizing down. Ended up going with Kamik.
customer_reviews.author: J. Daigneault

customer_reviews.title: Buy These Boots!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Chooka rainboots and I couldn't be happier with them. Great style--I always get compliments. So comfy and well-made. Still wearing my first pair which outlasted an expensive pair of department store rainboots.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: Loved these boots at first
customer_reviews.text: Loved these boots at first, not as dark as I liked but super comfy. However was super disappointed after a few months as the colors started wearing off and somehow the rubber of the boot ripped
customer_reviews.author: emilee

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot For Bad Weather
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots for rain or snow. They have a great fit and are stylish. I also liked the fact that they were not too tall or not to short but just right. We had an unusual amount of snow this year and these were perfect when walking in the snow and on those days when the snow was melting and you don't want to ruin a good pair of shoes. I shopped around a lot and had trouble finding a pair I liked until I saw this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Going half a size down was perfect for wearing thick socks with these
customer_reviews.text: I'm a solid 8.5, and I got these in an 8 per reviewer suggestions. Going half a size down was perfect for wearing thick socks with these, but if you're not planning on doing that, you probably need to go a whole size down. Haven't had the chance to wear these in the rain yet, but they're super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ADG

customer_reviews.title: SO big and sloppy.  But great looking.  Damn !
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed with these. Although I read many reviews that said they were sized larger than normal, I thought between my Super Feet orthotics and heavy socks I would be good to go. But they were so big that even with the addition of those two things, my feet sloshed around inside and slipped out as I walked. They really are cute and seemed to be made well, but are definitely a size or two bigger than stated.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Dlubac

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a rain boat I can wear! Muscular calves prevent my ability to get a boot on easily if at all. These boots are great. I still use a long shoehorn but foot slides easily into boot. Wish it had optional warm liner for wet winter days. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Janice B.

customer_reviews.title: if they didn't I would love them. Not too
customer_reviews.text: They started cracking on the sides within a few months...if they didn't I would love them. Not too durable
customer_reviews.author: Will Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: The boots were nice and well made. But for me, I have wide feet, they were a little too narrow across the ball of the foot and way too wide at the heel.Even with thicker socks the heel would be too wide and the front would never fit. The length was fine. I of course could not wear them and had to send them back.As I saw in other reviews they were not really glossy, more matte finish. Nice if they fit your particular foot.
customer_reviews.author: maxanon

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Fit than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the color and style, but the size 9 boot just didn't fit my 9 1/2 shoe size well and the 10 would have been too big. Sadly had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia S.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots kept my feet dry, but they ran a bit large and the sole bunched up the first time I wore them. I also have lines across my calves from where the tops of the boots rubbed, and I don't have large calves by any means. Make sure you wear socks that are tall enough and won't fall down your legs.
customer_reviews.author: Lester

customer_reviews.title: Chooka Rain Boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my granddaughter. She loves them and says they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Read,Read,Read

customer_reviews.title: Nice rain boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots ran true to size in length and are perhaps just a bit narrow. They're not too high, so they are relatively easy to get on and off. I wore them immediately after receiving them as we've had rainy weather. I have not worn them all day, however, so I can't comment on how comfortable they would be over a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Large and clunky
customer_reviews.text: Order a size down. Even with thick socks, they were too big on me. Also, very clunky. They are not a light boot at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed in the boot. I would think for the price the boot would have been a good one. But after only wearing the boots a few times,the boot has split were the sole is connected making them no longer water proof!
customer_reviews.author: Bot-Hell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: BEST EVER RAIN BOOTS. I wear them all the time and we have property that I always wear them to and they hold up great in the mud and the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable, torn after few wears
customer_reviews.text: Not durable at all, bought in August and they are already torn. It’s not as if they are a shoe that is worn all day everyday. I went out today and stepped in a puddle and got a rude awakening and a soaked foot. Tore right along the seam.
customer_reviews.author: lynn30

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fit!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for! Easy to slip on, mid-calf height and loose on the calf. I sized up to a 7 (normally a 6), and there is definitely extra room in the boot, but I just wear thicker socks with them. I would probably reccommend sticking to your regular size though! They also came super fast & early. I am so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DandellionGum

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I really love these and get lots of compliments. I don't recommend wearing them against bare legs, like with shorts. The rubber on the back rubbed my calves raw after walking in them for about an hour. But I just love them, anyway!
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes them
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves them, says they cute and not cheap feeling
customer_reviews.author: shane hawkins

customer_reviews.title: A little large but thick socks fix this......
customer_reviews.text: The rain boots are a little large. But when my daughter puts on thick (fuzzy) socks they fit fine. The top of the boot fits large calves (which other rain boots don't) so overall, she is pleased with the boots. We'll see how long they hold up as she walks around campus.
customer_reviews.author: NoVa

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter for rainy days at school. She wore them less than 10 times and suddenly the heel popped off making them useless.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA M NICOLAS

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots were really good quality, which I was not really expecting. They have a nice cloth lining that is helpful since rubber boots can get so cold. They are fairly heavy because of the thick sole. I typically wear a size 9, and I ordered a size 9, and they fit perfectly in the foot. The upper calf is fairly wide, but I like that because it is easy to tuck in pants and thick socks. They are really cute, and I love wearing them - I don't mind rainy days anymore!
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart within 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife last Christmas and she loved them. Unfortunately they fell apart within a year and I had to get her another pair (different brand) for Christmas this year. She did not walk in them all that much as she uses different boots for the winter and we didn't get that much rain this spring/summer. You can get boots from more established brands for similar prices.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Good for wide calved ladies!
customer_reviews.text: These rain boots were just as expected. I wear them all the time...even to date nights with a romper dress. They are the perfect boot for anyone with wider calves or who have problems fitting into most taller boots. They did crack at the seam after a few months. But i did wear them A LOT...so i'm not totally surprised. I will just repair them myself.
customer_reviews.author: PDX Native

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are also pretty bulky overall (but they are rain boots
customer_reviews.text: They're okay. I have smaller heels so they did not fit on me even with the correct size. The shoes are also pretty bulky overall (but they are rain boots!). They are fine shoes, they just didn't fit my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are her favorite "shoes" to wear now
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these rain boots! They are her favorite "shoes" to wear now. She said they are very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W Stilts

customer_reviews.title: The Chooka boots had great reviews for a 1/3 of the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these rain boots for a tailgate in a field when rain was predicted. I was originally leaning towards a Hunter mid-calf height boot however the price didn’t seem worth it. The Chooka boots had great reviews for a 1/3 of the price. They were comfortable to wear for 6+ hours in a muddy field. My only complaint was that they faded around the toe area. The rubber is now lighter and worn after 1 wear. For a dressier/office boot go with Hunter. For a pop on and wear in light rain this is a great option for the price.
customer_reviews.author: michele l. plantamura

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these boots and were super excited about them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots and were super excited about them, but they came deformed at the top, like they were squished in the box and they didn't look right when I would wear pants and tuck them in. Had to send them back =(
customer_reviews.author: Carly Connor

customer_reviews.title: They fit nice, not too big just comfortable roomy
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected or a little on the small side. I wear a 6 to 6.5 and ordered a 7. They fit nice, not too big just comfortable roomy. The instep is low and I can see how this might be a problem if you had on your exact size. The boots are a nice soft quality rubber and nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Beez

customer_reviews.title: a perfect height (that's rare to find)
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and for someone with larger calves, a perfect height (that's rare to find). They do run on the bigger size and unfortunately I'm stuck between sizes so I opted for the smaller ones. In big and small alike though, wear two pairs of socks because the heel tends to rub a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Lani Metzner

customer_reviews.title: great rain boots
customer_reviews.text: I would be able to give these a fifth star but the shoe insert on the bottom comes out ever time I take these off. My inserts in both shoes are all wrinkled up now and I have to flatten them ever time I put these on. But other than that, great rain boots!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Samulski

customer_reviews.title: Great rainboots!
customer_reviews.text: These fit great, are the perfect height and are pretty comfortable. The rubber has just the right amount of structure.
customer_reviews.author: KMH

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great rain boots for a fraction of what you would pay for hunters. Keeps the rain out as expected and more comfortable than expected. I'm a 8 1/2 and ordered a 9. There were HUGE. Returned for an 8 and they're perfect. I have huge calves and it's a great fit. There's a buckle to adjust too.
customer_reviews.author: M. De Botton

customer_reviews.title: Worthless! Split at seam on both boots .
customer_reviews.text: They split at the seam on both boots in the same place. I don't wear them that much already worthless. I bought additional pairs for family then this I would never buy Chooka again!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wear & looks cute
customer_reviews.text: These are cute black rain boots that protect the feet when walking through flooded areas, which is the case when it rains due to poor leveling. I deal with that at work & at home. My feet stay dry. The style is nice to leave on all day. I don't need them a lot but when I do, they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Castle

customer_reviews.title: Just as described and perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described! Perfect boots to walk the dog through bushes and trekking through mud. They are a little tricky to take off, but I think that's because I have high arches. Very easy to slip on. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Cenva

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my daughter. She wears a 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter. She wears a 7.5 and I ordered an 8. Should have ordered a 6. They were HUGE. Also, she is petite and the calves were WAY too wide for her skinny legs. I thought they were cute but the sizing needs to be more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Marynell

customer_reviews.title: Ripped to shreds. Worthless!
customer_reviews.text: These boots ripped to shreds in not even 4 months! Normal use... no hiking. Just to/from my car and around town.
customer_reviews.author: jujubee39@hotmail.com

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Bought them in pink and knew I had to have them in plain black. Very comfortable and fits perfectly with a thicker winter sock underneath. If you have larger calves (like I do) the lower cut is perfect and they are quite comfortable to walk in for long periods of time. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hare

customer_reviews.title: But super cute, fit well and really lasted
customer_reviews.text: must wear pants or high sock with these ... they irritated my legs. But super cute, fit well and really lasted!
customer_reviews.author: megan

product_meta.title: Chooka Women's Chooka Top Solid Mid Rain Boot
product_meta.description: Chooka boots and slippers are the new old favorites that you will reach for time and again. Function, fashion and comfort all meet right on your feet with every pair of Chooka boots.
feature_bullets: DO YOURSELF A SOLID THIS SEASON | ….and step into our boot-iful mid-height rain boots! A variety of vibrant colors combined with functional features make this an easy pick boot! This boot accommodates a wide range of styles and calf-widths.

WATERPROOF RUBBER UPPER | Our main goal is to combine fashion with function. Our Mid-Height Rain Boots are made with natural rubber, which will provide waterproof ability while enhancing your wear due to the strong, durable abilities of rubber.

HANDMADE CONSTRUCTION | Our Mid-Height Rain Boots undergo a handmade waterproof vulcanization process. This construction assists with strength and durability, as the seams are reinforced and weak spots reduced.

EASY ON AND OFF | An adjustable leather strap and pull tab help you get these boots on. This is perfect for the woman on the go! Additionally, they provide a unique accent that will make this boot stand out amongst a large crowd.

TRACTION RUBBER OUTSOLE | Nobody likes slipping and falling in wet weather, so we help prevent these slippery issues by making our Mid-Height Rain Boots with a traction rubber outsole that gives some slip-resistance.

COZY LINING, INSOLE | We use polyester/cotton blend lining that is soft to the touch and absorbs moisture. To cushion your feet, we use soft removable insoles that promise standing on your feet will no longer be a chore.
FIT | Our Mid-Height Rain Boots run a half-size bigger. For half-sizes, we recommend sizing down.

EASY CARE | To clean, use a damp warm cloth and mild liquid dish soap. Air dry. Silicone conditioners can be used too. We suggest storing our boots in a cool, dry area to help prevent the boot from damage.
MEASUREMENTS | The shaft is approximately 8.5" from the arch. The boot opening is approximately 14.75" around. The platform measures an approximate 0.75 inches. Please note that measurements vary.
